definition: to be fair/to be impartial/to settle (a matter etc)
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: OK, where is the streaking Minstrel?We've got to put an end to this.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，那個裸奔的吟遊詩人在哪？我們得把這事擺平。

sentences.english: Shirley stars got a call from the mayor, let him handle Qingdao demonstration event.
sentences.chinese: 厲辰星接到市長的電話，讓他擺平青島示威事件。

sentences.english: So this is the girl that roughed up Vega?
sentences.chinese: 這就是那個擺平維嘉的女孩？

sentences.english: If I don't floor him now, Ishall murder him sometime;
sentences.chinese: 如果我現在不擺平他，總有一天我會殺掉他。

sentences.english: Yu Xianyang turned and waved fists will be agile, a Japanese doctor.
sentences.chinese: 俞顯揚身手敏捷，轉身揮動拳腳將日本醫生擺平。
